ayas.text: qad sami`allāhu qawlal latī tujādiluka fī zawjihā watashtakī ilallāhi wallāhu yasma`u taḥāwurakumā ۚ innallāha samī`un baṣīr
alladhīna yuẓāhirūna minkum min nisā-ihim mā hunna ummahātihim ۖ in ummahātuhum illal lā-ī waladnahum ۚ wa innahum layaqūlūna munkaran minal qawli wazūrā ۚ wa innallāha la`afuwwun ghafūr
wal ladhīna yuẓāhirūna min nisā-ihim thumma ya`ūdūna limā qālū fataḥrīru raqabatim min qabli an yatamāssā ۚ dhālikum tū`aẓūna bih ۚ wallāhu bimā ta`malūna khabīr

faman lam yajid faṣiyāmu shahrayni mutatābi`ayni min qabli an yatamāssā ۖ faman lam yastaṭi` fa-iṭ`āmu sittīna miskīnā ۚ dhālika litu-minū billāhi warasūlih ۚ watilka ḥudūdullāh ۗ walilkāfirīna `adhābun alīm
innal ladhīna yuḥāddūnallāha warasūlahu kubitū kamā kubital ladhīna min qablihim ۚ waqad anzalnā āyātin bayyināt ۚ walilkāfirīna `adhābun muhīn
yawma yab`athuhumullāhu jamī`an fayunabbi-uhum bimā `amilū ۚ aḥṣāhullāhu wanasūh ۚ wallāhu `alā kulli shay-in shahīd

alam tara annallāha ya`lamu mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ ۖ mā yakūnu min najwā thalāthatin illā huwa rābi`uhum walā khamsatin illā huwa sādisuhum walā adnā min dhālika walā akthara illā huwa ma`ahum ayna mā kānū ۖ thumma yunabbi-uhum bimā `amilū yawmal qiyāmah ۚ innallāha bikulli shay-in `alīm

alam tara ilal ladhīna nuhū `anin najwā thumma ya`ūdūna limā nuhū `anhu wayatanājawna bil-ithmi wal `udwāni wa ma`ṣiyatir rasūli wa idhā jā-ūka ḥayyawka bimā lam yuḥayyika bihillāhu wayaqūlūna fī anfusihim lawlā yu`adhhibunallāhu bimā naqūl ۚ ḥasbuhum jahannamu yaṣlawnahā ۖ fabi-sal maṣīr
yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū idhā tanājaytum falā tatanājaw bil-ithmi wal `udwāni wa ma`ṣiyatir rasūli watanājaw bil birri wat taqwā ۖ wattaqullāhal ladhī ilayhi tuḥsharūn
innaman najwā minash shayṭāni liyaḥzunal ladhīna āmanū walaysa biḍārrihim shay-an illā bi-idhnillāh ۚ wa`alallāhi falyatawakkalil mu-minūn

yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū idhā qīla lakum tafassaḥū fil majālisi fafsaḥū yafsaḥillāhu lakum ۖ wa idhā qīlan-shuzū fanshuzū yarfa`illāhul ladhīna āmanū minkum wal ladhīna ūtul `il-ma darajāt ۚ wallāhu bimā ta`malūna khabīr
yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū idhā nājaytumur rasūla faqaddimū bayna yaday najwākum ṣadaqah ۚ dhālika khayrul lakum wa-aṭ-har ۚ fa-in lam tajidū fa-innallāha ghafūrun raḥīm
a-ashfaqtum an tuqaddimū bayna yaday najwākum ṣadaqāt ۚ fa-idh lam taf`alū watāballāhu `alaykum fa-aqīmuṣ ṣalāta wa-ātuz zakāta wa-aṭī`ullāha warasūlah ۚ wallāhu khabīrun bimā ta`malūn
alam tara ilal ladhīna tawallaw qawman ghaḍiballāhu `alayhim mā hum minkum walā minhum wayaḥlifūna `alal-kadhibi wahum ya`lamūn
a`addallāhu lahum `adhāban shadīdā ۖ innahum sā-a mā kānū ya`malūn
ittakhadhū aymānahum junnatan faṣaddū `an sabīlillāhi falahum `adhābun muhīn
lan tughniya `anhum amwāluhum walā awlāduhum minallāhi shay-ā ۚ ulā-ika aṣ-ḥābun nār ۖ hum fīhā khālidūn
yawma yab`athuhumullāhu jamī`an fayaḥlifūna lahu kamā yaḥlifūna lakum ۖ wayaḥsabūna annahum `alā shay-ī ۚ alā innahum humul kādhibūn
is-taḥwadha `alayhimush shayṭānu fa-ansāhum dhikrallāh ۚ ulā-ika ḥizbush shayṭān ۚ alā inna ḥizbash shayṭāni humul khāsirūn
innal ladhīna yuḥāddūnallāha warasūlahu ulā-ika fil-adhallīn
kataballāhu la-aghlibanna ana warusulī ۚ innallāha qawiyyun `azīz

lā tajidu qawman yu-minūna billāhi wal yawmil-ākhiri yuwāddūna man ḥāddallāha warasūlahu walaw kānū ābā-ahum aw abnā-ahum aw ikhwānahum aw `ashīratahum ۚ ulā-ika kataba fī qulūbihimul-iymāna wa-ayyadahum birūḥin minh ۖ wayudkhiluhum jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā ۚ raḍiyallāhu `anhum waraḍū `anh ۚ ulā-ika ḥizbullāh ۚ alā inna ḥizballāhi humul mufliḥūn
